languages.text: {n}Маражай поворачивает к вам с еще более озадаченным видом, чем архонт... но вовремя спохватывается, придавая своему лицу надменное выражение.{/n} "Как тонко! Сброд можно скормить разгневанным Арлекинам, а самому пожать плоды их трудов..."

{n}Marazhai turns to you, looking even more puzzled than the Archon... but recovers in time to don an arrogant expression.{/n} "How cunning! The rabble can be fed to the angry Harlequins, and you can reap the fruits of their labours..."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай поворачивает к вам с еще более озадаченным видом, чем архонт... но вовремя спохватывается, придавая своему лицу надменное выражение.{/n} "Как тонко! Сброд можно скормить разгневанным Арлекинам, а самому пожать плоды их трудов..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you looking even more puzzled than the Archon.... but recovers in time to give himself a haughty visage.{/n} "How cunning! The rabble can be fed to the angry Harlequins, and reap the fruits of their labours..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you looking even more puzzled than the Archon.... but recovers in time to give himself a haughty visage.{/n} "How cunning! The rabble can be fed to the angry Harlequins, and reap the fruits of their labours..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking even more puzzled than the Archon... but recovers in time to don an arrogant expression.{/n} "How cunning! The rabble can be fed to the angry Harlequins, and you can reap the fruits of their labours..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wendet sich zu dir. Er sieht noch verwirrte raus als der Archon ... fängt sich aber schnell genug wieder, um eine arrogante Miene aufzusetzen.{/n} "Wie gerissen! Der Pöbel kann an die zornigen Harlekine verfüttert werden, und Ihr könnt die Früchte ihrer Arbeit ernten ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking even more puzzled than the Archon... but recovers in time to don an arrogant expression.{/n} "How cunning! The rabble can be fed to the angry Harlequins, and you can reap the fruits of their labours..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai wendet sich zu dir. Er sieht noch verwirrte raus als der Archon ... fängt sich aber schnell genug wieder, um eine arrogante Miene aufzusetzen.{/n} "Wie gerissen! Der Pöbel kann an die zornigen Harlekine verfüttert werden, und Ihr könnt die Früchte ihrer Arbeit ernten ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋看着你，看起来比纳札骸还要疑惑……但他随后马上摆出了傲慢的表情。{/n}“真是狡猾！你打算把这群人丢给愤怒的丑角，趁机掠夺他们的胜利果实……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking even more puzzled than the Archon... but recovers in time to don an arrogant expression.{/n} "How cunning! The rabble can be fed to the angry Harlequins, and you can reap the fruits of their labours..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋看着你，看起来比纳札骸还要疑惑……但他随后马上摆出了傲慢的表情。{/n}“真是狡猾！你打算把这群人丢给愤怒的丑角，趁机掠夺他们的胜利果实……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se tourne vers vous, plus perplexe encore que l'archonte... mais se ressaisit à temps pour se maquiller d'arrogance.{/n} « Comme c'est astucieux ! La populace peut être jetée en pâture aux Arlequins en colère, et vous pourrez récolter les fruits de leur labeur... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking even more puzzled than the Archon... but recovers in time to don an arrogant expression.{/n} "How cunning! The rabble can be fed to the angry Harlequins, and you can reap the fruits of their labours..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se tourne vers vous, plus perplexe encore que l'archonte... mais se ressaisit à temps pour se maquiller d'arrogance.{/n} « Comme c'est astucieux ! La populace peut être jetée en pâture aux arlequins en colère, et vous pourrez récolter les fruits de leur labeur... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se gira hacia ti, más perplejo que el Arconte... pero se recupera a tiempo para adoptar una expresión arrogante.{/n} «¡Qué astuto! Así echas a esta chusma a los Arlequines furiosos mientras que tú cosechas el fruto de su labor...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking even more puzzled than the Archon... but recovers in time to don an arrogant expression.{/n} "How cunning! The rabble can be fed to the angry Harlequins, and you can reap the fruits of their labours..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se gira hacia ti, más perplejo que el Arconte... pero se recupera a tiempo para adoptar una expresión arrogante.{/n} «¡Qué astuto! Así echas a esta chusma a los Arlequines furiosos mientras que tú cosechas el fruto de su labor...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはアーコンよりもさらに困惑した様子であなたの方に振り向き…しかしすぐに傲慢な表情に戻る。{/n}「なんて狡猾な！暴徒たちは怒れるハーレクィンの餌となり、お前は奴らの働きによる実りを手にする…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking even more puzzled than the Archon... but recovers in time to don an arrogant expression.{/n} "How cunning! The rabble can be fed to the angry Harlequins, and you can reap the fruits of their labours..."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはアーコンよりもさらに困惑した様子であなたの方に振り向き…しかしすぐに傲慢な表情に戻る。{/n}「なんて狡猾な！暴徒たちは怒れるハーレクィンの餌となり、お前は奴らの働きによる実りを手にする…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Arkon'dan bile daha çok şaşkına dönen Marazhai, anında sana dönse de kendisini toparlayıp küstahça bir ifade takınıyor.{/n} "Ne kadar da sinsice! Ayaktakımı, öfkeli Arlekenlere kurban ediliyor; sen de onların emeklerinin meyvesini topluyorsun."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking even more puzzled than the Archon... but recovers in time to don an arrogant expression.{/n} "How cunning! The rabble can be fed to the angry Harlequins, and you can reap the fruits of their labours..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Arkon'dan daha bile şaşkına dönmüş olan Marazhai sana dönüyor ancak kendisini zamanında toparlıyor ve hemen küstah bir ifade takınıyor.{/n} "Ne kadar da sinsice! Ayaktakımı öfkeli Arlekenlere kurban ediliyor, sen de onların emeklerinin meyvesini topluyorsun."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
